source_caption_data.pre_caption: This video presents a static, eye-level view of a pixelated computer interface that fills the entire frame. Initially, the central area of the screen displays a webpage with green text on a dark background. A white arrow cursor is positioned in the middle ground on the right side of the text. The view then transitions to a search results page within the same window frame, where the cursor moves from the top left to the center to click on a link. The final view shows a new page where the words "ILLEGAL CONTENT" are centered in the upper-middle portion of the frame. Below this text, three identical images of angels are arranged horizontally across the center of the screen. The cursor remains on the right side of the frame. Throughout the video, the main window remains fixed, with only its internal content changing.
